mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shoppingbag(SBNO, SBPRODUCTCOLOR, SBPRODUCTSIZE, SBPRODUCTAMOUNT, MNO, PCODE) VALUES(sbno_seq.nextval, #{sbproductcolor}, #{sbproductsize}, #{sbproductamount}, #{mno}, #{pcode})
